description: While watching Mao and the others do Aikatsu, Shiori has come to want to be an idol. Aiming to be an idol that can give someone strength like the fairytale heroes she`s admired since she was little, she decides to challenge a new talent discovery audition. But it`s a harsh race along the road of Aikatsu!... saying that, is this really Aikatsu―!?

titles.title: マイ レボリューション
